biotools.summary:
Gamma-glutamyl transferase and cardiovascular risk in nonalcoholic fatty liver disease.

Welcome to the QRISK ® 2-2017 risk calculator: https://qrisk.org.

This calculator is only valid if you do not already have a diagnosis of coronary heart disease (including angina or heart attack) or stroke/transient ischaemic attack.

Welcome to the QRISK ® 2-2017 Web Calculator. You can use this calculator to work out your risk of having a heart attack or stroke over the next ten years by answering some simple questions. It is suitable for people who do not already have a diagnosis of heart disease or stroke.
